name: Those Nights at Fredbear's: Reboot
summary: hose Nights at Fredbear's Reboot is a discontinued official remake of the very first cancelled free-roam FNaF fan-game Nikson made. The remake features new story, new graphics, new characters etc. If you are going to use anything on this page for refrence in your fangame. Please credit the page and those who have contributed to it.
